job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop data driven software. As an AI engineer your responsibilities will include building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models. Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem., * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users. You work in the R&D department, but you will work together with other teams on a regular basis.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer, R&D

In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop data driven software. As an AI engineer your responsibilities will include building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models. Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem., * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users. You work in the R&D department, but you will work together with other teams on a regular basis.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-driven solutions with both external and internal models, including work with Vector databases and LLMs. It highlights researching, prototyping, and developing data-driven software, and building AI/ML driven systems that understand video and use the latest innovation. The core responsibilities align with developing and deploying generative AI applications, a key characteristic of a GenAI Engineer. While there's an element of ML engineering, the focus on LLMs and generative aspects points more strongly to the GenAI profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements' directly maps to understanding business context and translating needs into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'research, prototype and develop data driven software' and 'building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models' indicates the core activity of creating and adapting AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: research, prototype and develop data driven software

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's' explicitly mentions building systems using LLMs and related innovative technologies, which falls under modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience' describes the development of software services and features.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users' implies the need for robust deployment and maintenance of developed solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations' describes a process central to model development and experimentation.
job_tasks.phrase: rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations

soft_skills.phrase: Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem.
Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions
Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes
